short_description: Outputs linear-regression matrix corresponding to the input samples.
long_description: Outputs linear-regression matrix corresponding to the input samples. The <n+2> column of the matrix corresponds to the right-hand side of the model.

input_tables.name: input
input_tables.rDescription: Input table that contains one row for each data point and one column for each data point component
input_tables.description: Input table that contains one row for each data point and one column for each data point component

argument_clauses.name: InputColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: The column containing the input variables.
argument_clauses.description: The column containing the input variables.

argument_clauses.name: TargetColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: The column containing the target variable.
argument_clauses.description: The column containing the target variable.
